name: 黃正民

Week9: Midterm exam
Week10: Delta HMI
Week11: Delta PLC
Week12: Delta PLC
Week13: Delta VFD
Week14: Delta ASDA
Week15: Delta ASDA
Week16: Applications
Week17: Applications
